short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A Chrome extension to extend AnyDesk Features & Functionality

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This browser extension allows you to initiate AnyDesk connections directly within your browser, eliminating the need to switch between the browser and opening the AnyDesk application. 

Version Changes:
 1.0.3:
Added more details to help users understand what is an AnyDesk prefix
Updated Welcome Page
Updated Extension Page on click
1.0.4
New extension icon & better layout for displaying results and future API calls.
